TopicTitle: Asteroid Loses Its Class After Capture?

Articles.Content:
I wanted to see what class was the one I caught... only it doesn't say class after you rename it for some reason.

Is there any way to figure out the class on tonnage? It's a 104.13t one

I noticed this too. If you don't think to take note of the class before capture, you lose that information.

You can find it in the save files though. Look for a line like this:


prefabBaseURL = Procedural/PA_[B]C[/B]

That last letter is the size class.
